name: The Black Knight Lives! Quiz / Test | Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Nathan Garrett was Whitman's uncle. He died fighting which hero?
questions.explanation:
Iron Man.

	Garrett used his powers and equipment for evil, going against centuries of tradition! On his deathbed he repented, and passed the mantle on to Dane Whitman.

questions.text: Whenever the Ebony Blade draws blood, the one who wields the sword is unaffected.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The wielder is driven closer and closer to madness every time blood is drawn. Sir Percy, the first Black Knight, was deemed the only person noble enough to wield it.

questions.text: Whitman traveled through time and had adventures in the 12th century with which other Avengers member?
questions.explanation:
Sersi.

	Whitman and Sersi have been romantically linked for some time, and at one point even had their minds bonded together. Sersi is an Eternal, a nearly immortal mutant.

questions.text: When he was named Pendragon of his age, which of these pieces of equipment did Whitman NOT recieve?
questions.explanation:
Valinor.

	The Lady of the Lake named Whitman the Pendragon of his age shortly after Whitman returned to his normal time and universe only to find many heroes assumed dead after defeating Onslaught.

questions.text: In the comic book series "New Excalibur", what had Whitman done to keep himself busy?
questions.explanation:
He opened a museum.

	Dane Whitman opened a museum dedicated to the various Black Knights across the centuries, only to be yanked back to Arthurian times with the New Excalibur team!

questions.text: While a member of the Defenders, Whitman was turned to stone! Who caused this?
questions.explanation:
Enchantress.

	The villanous Enchantress turned Whitman's body to stone simply by kissing him! His soul was transported to the 12th century, but his body and soul were eventually restored.

questions.text: Who gave the horse Valinor to Whitman?
questions.explanation:
Amergin.

	The druid sorcerer Amergin made Whitman's soul inhabit the body of his ancestor, Eobar. An outstanding trait of Valinor is that he has wings, much like Pegasus from Grecian myth!

questions.text: Before he joined the Heroes for Hire, which villain did Whitman help the team defeat?
questions.explanation:
Nitro.

	Nitro is a radioactive villain who is prone to combustion! Other members of Heroes for Hire included Iron Fist, Power Man, She-Hulk and Hercules.

questions.text: Who is Proctor in relation to Whitman?
questions.correct: Proctor is an alternate version of Whitman
questions.explanation:
Proctor is an alternate version of Whitman.

	Proctor was a villain that targeted Sersi and her lover, Dane Whitman. His aim was to go through multiple timelines and kill his past selves.

questions.text: Whitman joined the Knights of Wundagore along with which superhero?
questions.explanation:
Quicksilver.

	Quicksilver is actually Pietro Maximoff, son of Magneto. He can move, think and react at super-speed, as well as having very fast reflexes. He has been married to Crystal of the Inhumans.
